WhyUs.title: A Flight Experience
WhyUs.bgAlt: Tandem paragliding above East Tyrol – paragliding with Dolomite panorama
WhyUs.einfachText: You don’t need any prior experience. We explain everything step by step and take care of the entire process. You only run a few metres – we handle the rest. Guided with clarity, calm, and safety, your dream of flying becomes reality without any fuss. Simply let go and enjoy.
WhyUs.sicherText: Safety is our top priority. We only fly in suitable, aeronautically safe weather conditions and with regularly maintained equipment. You’ll be accompanied by experienced certified tandem pilots who explain every step calmly and clearly. If conditions aren’t right, we don’t take off. Your trust and your sense of safety are what matter most.
WhyUs.unvergesslichText: What makes your flight unforgettable is that extraordinary sense of freedom – gliding silently above the peaks of Osttirol, as calm and free as an eagle riding the thermals. With our media package, we capture these moments in photos and video so you can relive your experience again and again and share it with your loved ones.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Only flying is more beautiful – experience Osttirol from above with us: simple, safe, and unforgettable.
FAQ.cat4: On the Day of Your Flight
FAQ.q1_0: KOFLY? I only know you as GLEITSCHIRM-TANDEMFLUG.COM!
FAQ.a1_0: There was always some confusion about the name, so we came up with a short and simple brand name for our offer. GLEITSCHIRM-TANDEMFLUG.COM is now called KOFLY, but is still available at GLEITSCHIRM-TANDEMFLUG.COM!
FAQ.q1_1: How does the enquiry process work?
FAQ.a1_1: You can reach us via the website form, by email, or ideally via WhatsApp or phone at +43 676 7293888, since we plan around the weather. We’ll get back to you promptly, give you a brief overview of the flight experience in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten, and highlight our expertise and safety standards. Together, we’ll go over your preferences: preferred date, number of people, weight, age, any health considerations, and whether you’d like to use a voucher. This way, we can prepare your flight in the best possible way.
FAQ.q1_2: How do I schedule an appointment?
FAQ.a1_2: Paragliding is only possible in safe weather conditions. Shortly before your holiday, it’s best to get in touch after our daily weather briefing (approx. 6–7 pm) by phone or WhatsApp. We’ll then send you all the details: available dates, the current weather report, and practical tips. You’ll receive a provisional reservation; 1–2 days before the flight, we check the weather once more and confirm the final appointment via WhatsApp or phone. Please note: we only fly in suitable conditions – and if the weather doesn’t cooperate, we reschedule free of charge. Your safety always comes first.
FAQ.q1_3: Can I reschedule my appointment for free?
FAQ.a1_3: Yes. If the weather doesn’t cooperate, we’ll reschedule or cancel your appointment free of charge. You take no risk.
FAQ.a1_4: If you’d like to give a voucher as a gift, you can pick it up in person or have it sent by post. After ordering, we’ll send you the voucher along with information material and confirm everything via email or WhatsApp. We clearly communicate the voucher’s validity period. Scheduling remains flexible: you choose your flight date. If the weather changes, you can reschedule free of charge.
FAQ.q2_1: What are the requirements for a tandem flight?
FAQ.a2_1: You don’t need any prior experience. A minimum age of around 4 years is possible; children can fly upon request. You should have normal to good physical fitness and be able to take a few brisk steps during take-off. The ideal weight is up to 110 kg, up to 120 kg upon request. As a guideline, a BMI of 27 applies. Acute heart conditions or severe back problems are exclusion criteria. Safety is our top priority – please let us know if you have any limitations, such as a hip replacement, post-operative restrictions, epilepsy, or a strong susceptibility to motion sickness or seasickness.
FAQ.a2_2: Ideally between 20 kg and 110 kg, up to 120 kg upon request. As a guideline, a BMI of 27 applies. It’s important that you can take a few brisk steps during take-off. Landing usually requires no running, as we land gently in a seated position.
FAQ.q2_3: Am I too old or too young?
FAQ.a2_3: You’re only as old as you feel. Anyone who is generally healthy and can take a few steady, brisk steps is welcome to fly with us. Children can fly upon request depending on their development and weight – generally from around 30 kg, with written parental consent.
FAQ.q2_4: What should I bring to my tandem flight appointment?
FAQ.a2_4: Depending on the season, warm, windproof clothing: a jacket, long trousers, and sturdy ankle-high shoes. Optionally, gloves (we provide heated gloves free of charge upon request) and sunglasses.
FAQ.a3_1: You can choose from several packages: The Classic Flight without photo/video (€150) is the standard tandem flight. The Classic Flight with photo/video (€170) combines the flight with professional footage. The Premium Flight (€190) is a specially curated premium experience with more time for the ascent, briefing, and flight. The Thermal Flight (€250) is designed for suitable thermal conditions and is particularly varied. You can optionally add photos/videos to any package (+€20) if not already included.
FAQ.a3_2:
With the Classic tandem paragliding flight, you’ll enjoy an unforgettable flight time of at least 20 to 30 minutes. Several flights are conducted one after another depending on pilot availability. A photo and video package is optionally available for 20 €.

The Premium tandem paragliding flight is an exclusive experience tailored to your wishes. You get more time for the ascent, briefing, and flight – so you can enjoy your adventure without any rush. With good thermals, you’ll get extra flight time, up to 40 minutes. This package is especially suited for couples and groups; upon request, multiple pilots can fly in parallel. Photos and video on an SD card are included and can be viewed on a tablet after the flight. We’re happy to arrange special requests.
FAQ.q3_3: What is the Thermal Tandem Flight?
FAQ.a3_3: For the Thermal Flight, we take off from the Steinermandl at Zettersfeld (2,220 m), usually in the late morning as the thermals begin. Since we can climb significantly higher, warm, windproof clothing, ankle-high shoes, gloves, and sunglasses are essential. The Thermal Flight lasts at least 60 minutes, often longer. If the thermals are noticeably weaker and the flight time is clearly shorter than planned, the pricing will be adjusted accordingly. Since thermals are highly weather-dependent, we cannot guarantee a specific minimum duration 100 %. Please book at least 2 weeks in advance and confirm the appointment by phone at +43 676 72 93 888 1–2 days before arrival.
FAQ.a3_4: In addition to the flight package, depending on the season, the ascent is extra: either a taxi in the off-season or the lift ticket from the Lienzer Bergbahnen for the ride up to the Steinermandl (2 sections). Photo/video costs 20 € if not included in the package.
FAQ.q3_5: Do you offer photo and video services?
FAQ.a3_5: Yes. For a 20 € surcharge (if not included in the package), we film and photograph with a GoPro. The footage is reviewed together at the landing site after the flight and then handed over on an SD card. If the material is unavailable or unreadable due to technical issues, the media package will not be charged; liability is excluded. After handover of the SD card, we assume no guarantee for any later issues with the card. If you prefer that we don’t use footage for our website or media, please let us know in advance. Professional post-production with music is available for an additional fee.
FAQ.q3_6: What does the Classic Tandem Flight include?
FAQ.a3_6: Our launch sites are the Steinermandl at Zettersfeld or Lienz’s local mountain, Hochstein. Flight time is approximately 20–30 minutes – a flight over the Lienz valley floor with the wonderful panorama of the Lienzer Dolomiten, for those who love to savour the moment! The photo & video package is optionally available.
FAQ.q3_7: What makes the Premium Tandem Flight special?
FAQ.a3_7: „GO PREMIUM“ – with an extra package of time, deceleration, and an unforgettable experience before, during, and after the flight! Flight time is approximately 20–45 minutes, and the photo and video package is included. The package with experience guarantee and individual attention – for discerning passengers!
FAQ.q3_8: What does the Thermal Tandem Flight offer?
FAQ.a3_8: For all flying enthusiasts who want to experience the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten beyond the peaks with the power of thermals! Following the motto: Soar with the birds in the thermals and enjoy the experience at 3,000 metres! The photo & video package is optionally available.
FAQ.q3_9: What is the Romantic Tandem Flight?
FAQ.a3_9: You set off in the late afternoon by taxi to the Hochsteinhütte, where a romantic dinner with an overnight stay in the idyllic mountain hut at over 2,000 metres awaits you. After breakfast at sunrise with a magnificent Dolomite panorama, we fly you back down to the valley!
FAQ.q3_10: Do you offer individual tandem flight adventures?
FAQ.a3_10: Have a special wish? Tandem Hike & Fly, tandem cross-country flight, a marriage proposal in the air, or a special birthday surprise? We organise just about anything! We also arrange tandem flights for larger groups.
FAQ.q3_11: What does the photo and video package include in detail?
FAQ.a3_11: To make the adventure truly unforgettable, our GoPro is available upon request on every flight for photos and videos. After the flight, you receive the footage conveniently on an SD card to take home! Upon request, we also offer 360° videos, livestreaming during the flight, and professionally edited videos.
FAQ.a4_1: Depending on the arrangement, we meet at the Touch Heaven or Bruno Girstmair flight school landing sites, but usually directly at the ticket office of the Lienzer Bergbahnen at the Zettersfeld gondola base station in Gaimberg, or at an agreed meeting point.
FAQ.a4_2: We fly in Osttirol in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten. Depending on the weather, we take off from Zettersfeld or Hochstein.
FAQ.q4_3: What can I expect during the tandem flight?
FAQ.a4_3: We accompany you with our equipment to the appropriate launch site at Zettersfeld or Hochstein. There, we first take in the stunning scenery and fresh mountain air above 2,000 metres. Your pilot goes through the briefing with you, we fill out the flight ticket, and adjust your comfortable harness. After the final check, we take off with a few brisk steps – and you feel the ground disappear beneath your feet. The excitement quickly gives way to calm enjoyment. We glide towards the Lienzer Dolomiten – our motto: „Serotonin statt Adrenalin“ (“Serotonin instead of adrenaline“), and upon request, both in perfect harmony. For the landing, depending on the situation, we take a few steps or touch down gently on our airbag. Depending on the flight package, the entire experience takes approximately 1.5 to 2.5 hours.
FAQ.q4_4: How do I prepare at the launch site?
FAQ.a4_4: Before the flight, you’ll receive a brief introduction: you’ll get to know the equipment and receive clear take-off instructions. During the launch run, you run briskly for 5–10 metres alongside us. Very important: when you feel the urge to sit down, keep running until we give you the signal to sit. You don’t need any prior experience – we guide you step by step. Calm, clear communication and safety are our top priorities throughout.
FAQ.a4_5: Enjoy tandem paragliding in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten. Your pilot explains the surroundings during the flight and tailors the experience to you – as a calm, leisurely glide or, depending on the package and conditions, as a more dynamic thermal flight. If photo/video is booked (or included in the package), we capture your experience. You sit back, breathe deeply, and enjoy the view – in safe hands.
FAQ.a4_6: The landing is gentle – depending on the plan, at the Touch Heaven landing site or at an agreed landing spot nearby. We show you in good time how to lift your feet slightly, and we land together in a seated position on the foam protector/airbag. Afterwards, we briefly discuss the experience. If you booked photo/video, we review the footage right at the landing site. Only once you’ve seen the material and are happy with it do we hand over the SD card. Payment can be made in cash or by prior arrangement via bank transfer/PayPal. And quite deliberately: with us, you can pay after the experience if you wish – making your flight completely risk-free.
FAQ.a5_1: Yes. Safety is our highest priority. We only fly in suitable, aeronautically safe weather conditions and exclusively with experienced, certified tandem pilots. Our equipment is regularly inspected in accordance with legal requirements. Additionally, we carry the mandatory commercial liability insurance. If not all conditions are met, we don’t take off – the flight is rescheduled. This way, you can experience your adventure with complete peace of mind.
FAQ.a5_2: After the flight, you’ll receive a personal thank-you message from us. We appreciate your feedback and, if you’re satisfied, your recommendation. We’re also happy to tell you about further offerings, such as „Ski & Fly“ in winter. Our goal is your complete satisfaction.
FAQ.q6_1: What are the best activities and experiences in East Tyrol?
FAQ.a6_1: East Tyrol offers numerous outdoor activities: Of course, a tandem paragliding flight in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten is the #1 highlight and an absolute must. Hiking in the Lienz Dolomites and at Grossglockner, rafting on the Isel river, climbing, mountain biking, and skiing in winter. We’re happy to help you with tips about East Tyrol via WhatsApp – get in touch, we’re here for you!
FAQ.q6_2: Can I come from Sillian, Matrei, St. Jakob or Kals for a tandem flight?
FAQ.a6_2: Yes. Our flying area in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten is easily reachable from Sillian (approx. 30 min), St. Jakob in Defereggental (approx. 35 min), Matrei in East Tyrol (approx. 25 min), and Kals am Grossglockner (approx. 40 min). Guests from the entire East Tyrol region are very welcome.
FAQ.q6_3: Which tandem flight providers are there in East Tyrol?
FAQ.a6_3:
In East Tyrol, Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com – KOFLY – is the leading provider for tandem paragliding in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten. With 5.0 stars from over 250 reviews, we are the top activity in Lienz on TripAdvisor. Of course, there are other providers in the region – we even work in partnership with some of them.

What sets us apart is our approach: We deliberately take our time. We schedule fewer flights per day because it’s not the number of launches that counts, but the quality of your experience. You as a passenger are our priority.

Beyond the highest safety standards, our goal is for you to truly feel the magic of free flight, to experience our passion, and to deeply absorb this moment of freedom. Our greatest reward is your smile after landing.
FAQ.q6_4: Where is the landing zone for paragliding in Lienz?
FAQ.a6_4:
Our official landing zones in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten are the “Touch Heaven” landing area and the landing zone of the Bruno Girstmair Flight School, the Postleite.

Depending on wind conditions, we launch from Zettersfeld at Steinermandl or from Hochstein.

The meeting point is arranged individually and is usually at the Lienzer Bergbahnen ticket office or directly at one of the two landing zones.

Buchen.title: Enquiry & Voucher
Buchen.intro: The final appointment confirmation depends on the weather, usually shortly before the planned date. If the weather doesn’t cooperate, we’ll reschedule or cancel your flight free of charge.
Buchen.infoContent:
We are your direct contact for your tandem paragliding flight in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten. With us, you are not booking an anonymous experience but a personal flight adventure with experienced certified tandem pilots. From first contact to landing, we accompany you personally.

All appointments are weather-dependent. We recommend getting in touch shortly before your holiday or on the day of arrival in the evening – ideally after our daily weather briefing between 6:00 and 7:00 PM. This way we can find the best date for your experience together.

In case of bad weather, we reschedule or cancel free of charge. Your sense of safety comes first for us.
Buchen.terminSubtitle: Fill out the form and we’ll get back to you promptly.
Buchen.gutscheinSubtitle: A tandem paragliding voucher – the ultimate experience gift above the Lienzer Dolomiten. Pick-up or postal delivery.
Buchen.gutscheinInfoContent:

Please read our FAQ and Terms & Conditions carefully first, then fill out the order form. The voucher can be picked up in person or sent by post. You will receive the payment details after placing your order.

Please transfer the package price (plus shipping costs if applicable) to the following account:
IBAN: AT41 3600 0000 0926 4573
SWIFT/BIC: RZTIAT22
Daniel Kofler – Raiffeisenbank Lienz

Ablauf.heroP1: Flying is one of humanity’s oldest dreams. Since the beginning of time, we have gazed at the sky, watching an eagle trace silent circles, and felt that quiet longing: to be up there, just once. Weightless. Free. With nothing between you and the world but the wind and the silence.
Ablauf.heroP2: With tandem paragliding, this dream becomes tangible. You need no prior experience, no special preparation – just the desire to feel it. Everything else is in our hands.
Ablauf.heroP3: Here we show you step by step how your flight experience in the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten unfolds. From first contact to aftercare – clear, transparent, and just as we have lived it for many years.
Ablauf.safetyP1: Before we talk about the thrill and the excitement, we want to assure you of one thing: your safety is non-negotiable. We fly exclusively in suitable, aeronautically flawless weather conditions – with experienced certified tandem pilots and regularly maintained equipment.
Ablauf.safetyP2: Our commercial liability insurance through Air & More provides you with additional protection. And if the conditions at the launch site are not one hundred percent right, we do not take off. This is not a limitation – it is our promise to you.
Ablauf.safetyP3: We want you to feel well looked after from the very first moment. Not because we say so, but because you sense it – in the calm with which we work, in the clarity of our communication, and in the experience behind every single movement.
Ablauf.step01P1: When you reach out to us, you can contact us via our website, by email at info@Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com, or most directly via WhatsApp and by phone at +43 676 7293888. We especially value the personal contact via WhatsApp or phone, because our schedules depend on the weather and this allows us to respond to you flexibly and straightforwardly.
Ablauf.step01P2: In our first conversation, we greet you personally, give you a brief insight into the experience at the Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten, and calmly address all open questions. Your preferred date, the number of people, body weight, age, any health considerations, and whether you’d like to fly with a voucher or book directly – we take care of everything.
Ablauf.step01Hint: The quickest way to reach us is via WhatsApp or at +43 676 7293888
Ablauf.step02P1: Transparency is an integral part of a premium experience for us. That is why we speak openly about the requirements, so you can feel confident from the very start.
Ablauf.step02P2: Ideally, your body weight should be up to 110 kg. Upon request, we also fly up to 120 kg, and children under 30 kg are welcome by prior arrangement. As a rough guideline, a BMI of about 28 applies – though what always counts is your overall individual impression, not a number on the scale.
Ablauf.step02P3: You should be able to walk briskly for about five to ten metres. Acute heart conditions or severe back problems unfortunately preclude a flight. In the case of a hip replacement, post-operative limitations, epilepsy, or a susceptibility to nausea – such as motion sickness or seasickness – we kindly ask you to let us know in advance.
Ablauf.step02P4: If there are any doubts, we will discuss them with you personally and at ease. Because safety always comes first for us – and that also means being honest with you.
Ablauf.step03P1: Various packages are available for your flight experience. We take our time to explain the differences to you at ease – in terms of flight duration, thermal component, and the intensity of the experience. This way, you can make a conscious choice for the package that feels right for you.
Ablauf.step03P2: The Premium Tandem Flight at € 190 offers the comprehensive experience. The Classic Flight is available from € 150, with the photo and video package from € 170. For those seeking the updraft and wanting to experience the mountains from the thermals, there is the Thermal Flight at € 250. The photo and video package can be added to most packages for an optional € 20 – so you can take your experience home with you.
Ablauf.step03P3: No pressure, no rush. You decide what feels right for you.
Ablauf.step04Title: Give the gift of an experience
Ablauf.step04P1: If you’d like to give someone the dream of flight, we prepare the voucher with care for you. You can pick it up in person or have it conveniently delivered by post. After your order, we send the voucher along with suitable information material and confirm everything via email or WhatsApp. You will, of course, also receive the payment details for the bank transfer.
Ablauf.step04P2: We clearly communicate the validity in the accompanying letter. Scheduling remains flexibly arranged – and weather-related rescheduling is possible at any time free of charge. This way, the gift recipient can take their time choosing the perfect moment.
Ablauf.step04Hint: Weather-related rescheduling is possible at any time free of charge – flexibly arranged and without time pressure.
Ablauf.step05Title: Your appointment – aligned with wind and weather
Ablauf.step05P1: Paragliding thrives on the interplay with nature. We carefully coordinate every appointment with the current weather conditions, so your experience is not only safe but truly special. Many of our passengers get in touch shortly before their holiday or on the evening of their arrival day – after our daily weather briefing between 6:00 and 7:00 pm.
Ablauf.step05P2: You’ll then receive all the important information, suggested dates, and a personal weather assessment via WhatsApp or your preferred messenger. Should an appointment not work out, we’ll find the next best time together. In the meantime, we keep you updated after each weather briefing.
Ablauf.step05P3: Free rescheduling is a matter of course for us. Safety always comes first – and a great experience requires the right conditions.
Ablauf.step06Title: Meeting point on the day of your flight
Ablauf.step06P1: On the day of your flight, we meet – depending on the arrangement – at the Touch Heaven landing site or directly at the ticket office at the entrance of the Lienzer Bergbahnen in Gaimberg. From there, we organise everything for you. We’ll let you know the exact meeting point in good time.
Ablauf.step06P2: Depending on the wind and weather conditions, we take off either from Zettersfeld or Hochstein – both nestled amidst the Lienzer Dolomiten, with a panorama you won’t forget in a hurry. Plan for the entire experience to take about one and a half to two hours. We take care of everything – you simply need to show up.
Ablauf.step06Hint: Meeting point: Touch Heaven landing site or ticket office of the Lienzer Bergbahnen in Gaimberg – we’ll let you know everything in good time.
Ablauf.step07Title: At the launch site – calm and step by step
Ablauf.step07P1: At the launch site, we prepare you calmly and methodically. No rush, no time pressure. After a brief, clear introduction, we put on the equipment together and go through the take-off procedure – so you know exactly what to expect.
Ablauf.step07P2: During take-off, we first inflate the paraglider, then you run briskly alongside. When you feel the urge to sit down, simply keep running until we give you the signal. Then you tuck up your legs, lean back into the harness – and enjoy the feeling of the ground falling away beneath you.
Ablauf.step07P3: You need no prior experience. We give you clear, calm instructions and are right by your side – from the first step to being airborne.
Ablauf.step08Title: Your flight – the moment that stays with you
Ablauf.step08P1: And then you are in the air. The sounds grow quieter, the world grows wider. Below you the Lienzer Dolomiten, around you only the wind and a silence you may never have experienced before. This is the moment you understand why people have dreamed of flying for centuries.
Ablauf.step08P2: During the flight, we explain the surroundings and tailor the experience entirely to your wishes. Calm and leisurely, if you want to take in the vastness. A little more dynamic, if you want to feel it. You always have a say.
Ablauf.step08P3: If you’ve chosen the media package, photos and videos are captured during the flight – so you can take this extraordinary change of perspective home with you. In suitable thermal conditions, we also offer you the opportunity to experience the updraft and see the mountains from an entirely different altitude.
Ablauf.step08ImageAlt: Tandem flight above the Lienzer Dolomiten
Ablauf.step09Title: Gentle landing and a shared reflection
Ablauf.step09P1: The landing is gentle, at the Touch Heaven landing site. Shortly before touchdown, you extend your feet slightly forward and up, together and relaxed – and we land safely in a seated position on the foam protector. Everything calm, everything step by step.
Ablauf.step09P2: Afterwards, we take time for a shared debrief. If you booked the media package, we review the photos and video footage together. Once you’ve checked the material and confirmed it’s in order, we hand over the SD card – your memento of this special day.
Ablauf.step09P3: Should a technical defect with the camera or SD card occur and the material be unreadable, the media package does not need to be paid for. Any further liability is excluded. We cannot guarantee the later functionality of the SD card.
Ablauf.step09ImageAlt: Landing at the Touch Heaven landing site
Ablauf.step10P1: Payment can be made in cash, by express bank transfer in advance, or by arrangement via PayPal, debit, or credit card. With us, you are expressly welcome to pay after the flight – risk-free and without any advance payment. Because we want you to enjoy your experience without a care.
Ablauf.step10P2: After your flight, you’ll receive a personal thank-you message from us. We appreciate your feedback and your recommendation – and we’re happy to tell you about special opportunities such as „Ski & Fly“, if you’d like to continue the dream of flying in winter in a way all of its own.
Ablauf.step10Hint: You can pay after the flight – risk-free, relaxed, and without any advance payment.
Ablauf.closeP1: Experience Osttirol from above with us. Glide silently over the Lienzer Dolomiten, let your gaze wander across a mountain world that leaves you speechless. An experience as old as humanity’s dream of flight – and one we make possible for you. Simple, safe, and in the hands of our experienced certified tandem pilots.
Ablauf.closeP2: For you, young and old alike. For everyone who wants to feel, just once, what freedom is like.

AGB.title: Gleitschirm-Tandemflug GTC’s
AGB.subtitle: General business and transport terms and conditions
AGB.generalP1: Daniel Kofler – Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com organises and pilots tandem paraglider flights. The company uses only self-employed, experienced, state-licensed tandem pilots who are themselves the entrepreneurs responsible for the execution of the flights and are, as such, the contractual partners of the tandem passengers. Each tandem pilot who carries out a flight is the legally responsible contractual partner.
AGB.generalP2: The liability, responsibility and all services performed are the sole responsibility of the state-tested, licensed pilots who have been booked by Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com.
AGB.generalP3: The transportation of persons in tandem paragliders and all other services performed by Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com are subject to Austrian law, especially the air traffic regulations as well as the following conditions.
AGB.generalP4: Before the start of the flight, the tandem passenger (in the case of a child, a legal guardian or an adult escort) must carefully read the transportation contract and confirm his agreement with his signature. Immediately before take-off, the tandem passenger will receive instructions from the pilot about the take-off procedure. If the tandem passenger does not understand the instructions or is unable, for some other reason, to follow the instructions, he must inform the pilot immediately.
AGB.bookingP1: The tandem passenger declares hereby that his participation in a paragliding tandem flight is only because of his personal interest. The expenses for the travel to the airport shall be borne by the tandem passenger. The cost of the mountain lift and similar items are not included in the flight fee. All other travel expenses that arise from weather conditions are, likewise, not included in the price. If the passenger is not present at the agreed-upon departure time for the flight, the entire fee for the flight must be paid by him.
AGB.bookingP2: The execution and course of the flight will be determined by the pilot. The pilot is also always responsible for the successful completion of the flight.
AGB.bookingP3: Please note that, even in the case of an agreed-upon flight time, the passenger has no right to demand the completion of the tandem flight if the weather conditions in the flight area will not allow this to be done safely. In the case of delay of take-off, there will be no right to claim damages, refunds, or the reimbursement of any other costs. The passenger, however, does retain a claim to reimbursement for the price of the flight.
AGB.bookingP4: Cancellations on account of weather conditions do not require an objective justification – the subjective impression of the responsible pilot is sufficient.
AGB.bookingP5: The flight duration is always dependant on weather conditions and the desired style or type of flight. Because of that, it is not possible to guarantee a standardised flight time. The flight route, the landing place and the flight time may be changed at any time on account of safety or operational considerations. The tandem passenger does not have any claim for compensation of any kind as a result of such changes.
AGB.riskTitle: Risk instruction and flying capability of the tandem passenger
AGB.riskP1: In spite of all appropriate precautions, accidents can occur in paragliding. Our highest goal is to minimise this risk as much as possible.
AGB.riskP2: The passenger must immediately follow the instructions of the pilot at all times. The passenger will receive a theoretical introduction before take-off. If these instructions are not followed during the take-off, flight, and landing, the safety of the pilot and passenger can be endangered.
AGB.riskP3: The pilot can also refuse to allow the passenger to participate in flight operations if the passenger ignores his instructions. If the passenger acts in contravention of these requirements, he no longer has any claim on completion of the tandem flight, and any claim for refund of the flight fees is thereby void. In the case of personal injury caused by not following instructions, the passenger bears the liability. For intentional or grossly negligent damage to the pilot’s equipment or the property of a third party, the liability will be borne by the passenger.
AGB.riskP4: The passenger declares herewith explicitly that he is physically and mentally healthy and confirms that he considers himself to be capable of handling the stresses of the flight. If there is any uncertainty about the passenger’s flight capability, the passenger must, without fail, notify the tandem pilot before the flight.
AGB.riskListIntro: The pilot must be informed before the flight in the case of:
AGB.riskItem1: Limitations on the passenger’s ability to move freely
AGB.riskItem2: Unhealthy conditions of the heart, back or blood pressure
AGB.riskItem4: Spiritual or mental defects/malfunctions (drug addiction, consciousness impairments or similar conditions) within the last 12 months
AGB.riskItem5: Alcohol consumption and use of strong medications within the last 12 hours
AGB.riskP5: In the case of uncertainty about the passenger’s fitness for flight, Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com is obliged to inform the tandem passenger about all necessary requirements.
AGB.equipmentP1: The tandem passenger is obliged to be dressed for the paraglider tandem flight in suitable clothing (weather- and wind-resistant, can get dirty), ankle-high, solid hiking boots, gloves and sunglasses.
AGB.equipmentP2: The pilots of Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com will provide tandem flight helmets and flying equipment.
AGB.insuranceP1: To satisfy all claims of passengers according to the liability regulations of the Austrian Air Traffic law, Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com has taken out an insurance policy with „AIR&MORE Versicherungsagentur für Flugsport“. Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com disclaims all liability for claims that are greater than the legally specified coverage amounts.
AGB.insuranceP2: Articles brought along on tandem flights (specifically money, cellphones, cameras, glasses and other valuable items) must be secured/stored appropriately. Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com assumes no liability if such items are lost or damaged.
AGB.insuranceP3: The tandem pilots of Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com cannot be held responsible for damages or accidents that occur on the way to and from the take-off site and agreed-upon meeting places.
AGB.insuranceP4: Exclusion from or limitation of liability apply, accordingly, for employees, self-employed tandem pilots and representatives of Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com
AGB.insuranceP5: A damage compensation obligation for pilots of Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com only exists insofar as damages are caused by grossly negligent or intentional actions/omissions on the part of the tandem pilot. The liability of the carrier is limited to the objects accompanying the passenger up to the maximum amount covered by the contracted insurance policy. Claims that exceed this amount will only be valid in the case of intent or gross negligence.
AGB.photoP1: The quality of the photo and video recordings is the sole responsibility of the executing tandem pilot. In the event of failures of video recording devices and cameras during a tandem flight, the costs of the photo and video package will be refunded in full and there is no legal claim to a repetition of the flight or the video or photo recordings. The photo and video material is normally reviewed and checked on a smartphone with the passenger after the flight; in case of insufficient quality, it is at the tandem pilot’s discretion whether or not to refund the photo and video package price.
AGB.rightsTitle: Right to use of photo and video material
AGB.rightsP1: The passenger agrees that all photos and video recordings made during the tandem flight can be used by Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com without limitations. The copyright for such material belongs to Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com
AGB.voucherTitle: Gift certificate – terms of payment and validity
AGB.voucherP1: By ordering a tandem flight gift certificate, the buyer undertakes a binding obligation to pay the price of purchase. The price must be paid within seven days after receiving the gift certificate without deductions of any kind. When booking a tandem flight without a gift certificate, the flight price must be paid in cash immediately after completion of the flight.
AGB.voucherP2: Gift certificates expire two years after the date of issue. Special arrangements can be agreed upon in individual cases. Passengers will bring the gift certificates/tickets with them on the day of the flight and turn them over to the pilot.
AGB.cancelP1: According to the KSchG (Austrian customer protection law), claims for refunds of the purchase price can be made within 14 days after receiving the gift certificate without stating a reason. Therefore, please return the gift certificate within this time period.
AGB.cancelP2: The flight guest can, at any time, cancel an agreed upon event date by email to info@danielkofler.com. Cancellation is free of charge up until 3 days before the scheduled date. Cancellations between 2 days and 24 hours before the scheduled date are charged for 50% of the purchase price. Gift certificates and tickets are invalid after a cancellation and become valid again after receipt of the cancellation payment. The remaining purchase price will not be refunded under any circumstances. That applies also to gift certificates or tickets from resellers/distribution partners. For cancellations within 24 hours, the cancellation fee will be 100%.
AGB.finalP1: If parts of this Terms and Conditions of Business for Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com are invalid, this will not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of the T&C. An invalid provision will be replaced by the provision that comes closest to the content and intent of the original provision.
AGB.finalP2: By paying the invoice amount, by orally agreeing to a transportation order or by buying a flight ticket, the tandem passenger has entered into an air carrier contract with the relevant tandem pilot of Gleitschirm-Tandemflug.com. This contract is subject to Austrian law. The court of jurisdiction and place of fulfillment of all obligations is Lienz in East Tyrol.

Urlaub.heroTitle: The one experience you won’t just
Urlaub.heroP1: East Tyrol has it all: hiking trails with Dolomite panoramas, crystal-clear mountain lakes and huts serving Kaiserschmarrn. But ask anyone who’s been here about the one moment that truly stuck – and you’ll almost always hear: the tandem flight.
Urlaub.heroP2: No cable car, no summit-selfie, no viewpoint can replace what you experience up there: ten minutes of silent gliding above the Lienz valley floor, gazing at the Dolomites, the Hohe Tauern and across to the Puster Valley. It’s not an adrenaline rush – it’s a moment that stays with you.
Urlaub.whyTitle: Why a tandem flight instead of another viewpoint?
Urlaub.whyP1: A viewpoint shows you the mountains. A tandem flight lets you become part of them. You glide silently at eye level with the peaks – and suddenly you understand why pilots talk about “addiction”.
Urlaub.whyTimeP1: From meeting point to landing, a tandem flight takes about one hour – including the ride up, briefing and the flight itself. No half a holiday day lost, just a compact experience that outshines the rest of your trip.
Urlaub.whyEmotionP1: Let’s be honest: how many summit photos do you actually look at again? With a tandem flight you get photos and HD video from a perspective only eagles know. That’s content you’ll genuinely want to share.
Urlaub.whySocialP1: Whether you fly as a couple, watch your family from the landing field or want some headspace on your own: there’s a celebration at the bottom. A little schnapps after the flight is simply part of it.
Urlaub.targetTitle: Who is a tandem flight for?
Urlaub.targetFamilyP1: Children can fly from a body weight of approx. 20 kg. Our pilots have years of experience with young passengers and are especially gentle. Parents can watch from the landing area – or fly themselves.
Urlaub.targetCoupleP1: Two pilots, two paragliders, one shared take-off: you fly side by side above the Dolomites and afterwards you have a story better than any souvenir. The perfect gift for each other – or simply for yourselves.
Urlaub.targetSoloP1: Travelling alone doesn’t mean experiencing alone. On a tandem flight it’s just you and your pilot – no group, no time pressure. Simply you, the paraglider and the silence above East Tyrol.
Urlaub.processStep1P1: Contact us via WhatsApp, phone or the booking form. We’re flexible and work around your holiday schedule – even last-minute requests are no problem.
Urlaub.processStep2P1: We meet directly in Lienz or at the cable car station. The ride to the launch site takes about 15 minutes – during which we explain everything you need to know.
Urlaub.processStep3P1: After just a few steps you’re airborne. The flight lasts at least 20–30 minutes, and significantly longer with thermals. You land gently on the meadow – and understand why everyone raves about it.
Urlaub.faqClothingQ: What should I wear for the tandem flight?
Urlaub.faqClothingA: Sturdy, ankle-high shoes (hiking boots ideal), long trousers and a windproof jacket. At 2,000 m it can be chilly even in summer. Gloves and sunglasses recommended – we provide a helmet.
Urlaub.faqWeatherA: Safety first: we only fly in suitable conditions. The evening before, between 6 and 7 pm, we’ll give you a weather update. If a date needs to be rescheduled, it’s free of charge – zero risk for you.
Urlaub.faqWeightA: The ideal weight range is 20 to 110 kg. Up to 120 kg a flight is possible on request, depending on wind conditions. Your pilot will discuss this individually with you.
Urlaub.faqKidsQ: From what age can children fly?
Urlaub.faqKidsA: There’s no fixed minimum age – what matters is body weight (from approx. 20 kg) and that your child actually wants to do it. Our pilots are experienced with children and take things especially calmly.
Urlaub.faqMediaQ: Will photos and videos be taken?
Urlaub.faqMediaA: Yes! With the media package (included in Classic+Media, Premium and XXL) your pilot films the entire flight in HD and takes photos. You get everything on an SD card right after landing. Price: from € 170 with media.
Urlaub.faqVoucherQ: Can I give a voucher as a gift?
Urlaub.faqVoucherA: Absolutely – the voucher is one of our most popular products. You can order it online, it’s delivered instantly as a PDF and is valid for 3 years. Perfect for birthdays, Christmas or as a holiday surprise.

Paragleiten.heroTitleAccent: what you should know as a visitor
Paragleiten.heroP1: The Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten and the wider East Tyrol region rank among Austria’s most renowned flying areas – and for good reason. In a compact area you’ll find numerous stunning launch sites with completely different characters, from relaxed panorama flights to challenging XC thermal flights.
Paragleiten.heroP2: This page is not a pilot handbook. It shows you as a visitor and potential tandem guest how diverse the flying areas in East Tyrol are – and helps you understand paragliding a little better.
Paragleiten.tandemVsSoloTitle: A guided tandem flight or fly solo?
Paragleiten.tandemVsSoloP1: On a tandem flight with us you fly with an experienced, certified pilot who handles everything: take-off, steering, landing. You need no experience and no gear – just sturdy shoes and a desire to fly. Flight time is approx. 20–30 minutes.
Paragleiten.tandemVsSoloP2: If you want to fly solo, you’ll need a valid paragliding licence (in Austria: ÖAeC licence) and your own equipment. The Airpark Lienzer Dolomiten offers excellent conditions for licensed pilots – well-prepared launch sites and reliable thermals from May onwards.
Paragleiten.seasonTitle: When is the best time to fly?
Paragleiten.seasonP1: We fly almost all year round – the core season runs from May to October. The best thermal conditions are in early summer (May to July), when the sun heats the slopes and creates stable updrafts.
Paragleiten.seasonP2: For tandem guests who prefer a calm pleasure flight, stable weather conditions are ideal: less thermal activity, silky-smooth air and often the clearest visibility of the year. In summer we launch in the morning or late afternoon when the air is calmer.
Paragleiten.tandemAreasIntro: Zettersfeld and Hochstein are our launch sites for tandem flights – and at the same time outstanding flying areas for licensed paraglider pilots.
Paragleiten.zettersfeldP1: Zettersfeld is our most-flown launch site – and for good reason. From up here you have a 360-degree panorama of the Lienzer Dolomiten, the Schobergruppe and the Hohe Tauern. The launch area is spacious, the ascent by cable car relaxed.
Paragleiten.zettersfeldP2: Ideal for: first-timers, families and anyone seeking a calm pleasure flight with maximum views. Landing is directly in the Lienz valley floor – the town literally at your feet.
Paragleiten.hochsteinP1: Hochstein sits directly above Lienz and offers a dramatic flight along the steep rock faces of the Lienzer Dolomiten. The altitude difference to the landing site is over 1,500 metres – meaning long flight time and breathtaking depth.
Paragleiten.hochsteinP2: Ideal for: guests seeking a more intense flying experience alongside stunning views of the Lienz valley floor. The ascent is by shuttle or taxi along a scenic asphalt road.
Paragleiten.pilotPustertalTitle: Flying areas in the Puster Valley
Paragleiten.pilotPustertalIntro: The Thurntaler and Golzentipp are beautiful XC and pleasure-flying areas for paraglider pilots with their own licence.
Paragleiten.thurntalerP1: The Thurntaler near Sillian opens up views across the wide Puster Valley and the Carnic Alps. It’s a calm flying area with diverse flying possibilities.
Paragleiten.thurntalerP2: Ideal for: pilots in the upper Puster Valley who prefer a short drive and a relaxed flight experience in less-frequented surroundings.
Paragleiten.golzentippP1: The Golzentipp in Obertilliach is the secret favourite of experienced pilots. Away from the main routes, you experience flying in its purest form: no crowds, maximum openness, untouched mountain landscape.
Paragleiten.golzentippP2: Ideal for: pilots seeking something special who are happy to accept the slightly longer drive (approx. 38 min from Lienz). The reward: a flying experience you won’t find anywhere else.
Paragleiten.pilotIseltalTitle: Flying areas in the Isel Valley
Paragleiten.pilotIseltalIntro: The Isel Valley is home to some of the most spectacular flying areas in the Alps – high-alpine, untouched and a paradise for experienced pilots.
Paragleiten.goldriedP1: A stunning flying area for pleasure and XC pilots. The launch site facing Kals is the starting point for the longest XC flights in Austria. Incredible panorama surrounded by famous three-thousanders and a breathtaking view of the Großglockner.
Paragleiten.goldriedP2: Ideal for: experienced pilots and XC record-chasers as well as pilots who want to do high-alpine cross-country flights. Altitude difference: 1,200 m.
Paragleiten.virgenP1: Virgen offers a fantastic launch site at 2,200 m with the Goldplan – and a passionate local flying community that lives a true pilot lifestyle here. Half the village is out paragliding!
Paragleiten.virgenP2: Ideal for: pleasure pilots and anyone who wants to join a welcoming community. Altitude difference: 1,000 m.
Paragleiten.praegratenP1: An incredibly beautiful flying area – a paraglider’s paradise and absolute insider tip, best enjoyed with local pilot knowledge. Soaring in the thermals here means flying in the heart of the Alps between steep rock faces, with an unforgettable view of the Großvenediger, Austria’s second-highest peak.
Paragleiten.praegratenP2: Ideal for: experienced XC pilots, hike-&-fly addicts and pleasure pilots looking for something truly special. Altitude difference: 830–1,280 m.
Paragleiten.alkusP1: A beautiful small flying area at the entrance to the Isel Valley with a small but very active pilot community. A paradise for hike & fly, soaring at the Schleinitzer Tor or reverse thermals late into the evening. Local pilot knowledge is essential to fully enjoy this area’s potential.
Paragleiten.alkusP2: Ideal for: intermediate to experienced pilots who enjoy hike & fly, soaring and XC flights.
Paragleiten.moreAreasTitle: More flying areas in East Tyrol
Paragleiten.moreAreasP1: Many more beautiful flying areas can be found in the east of East Tyrol: the Embergealm above Greifenburg in the Drau Valley is an easy, well-developed paraglider’s eldorado. Dellach and Berg in the Drau Valley also offer great launch options.
Paragleiten.moreAreasP2: The Möll Valley is less developed but offers beautiful launch sites at Heiligenblut and the Marterle above Rangersdorf for XC thermal flights, pleasure flying and stunning hike-&-fly possibilities.
Paragleiten.tandemFromAreasTitle: On holiday in one of these areas?
Paragleiten.tandemFromAreasP: If you’re interested in a tandem flight – get in touch! Lienz and our beautiful, safe launch sites are reachable from most valleys in under 45 minutes. On request we can also fly in other areas around Lienz, or we’ll connect you with a trusted local tandem partner and advise you.
Paragleiten.faqSafetyQ: How safe is a tandem flight?
Paragleiten.faqSafetyA: Very safe. Our pilots are state-certified, have been flying for many years and check conditions before every take-off. Equipment is regularly maintained and replaced per manufacturer guidelines. Additionally, both pilot and passenger carry a rescue system (reserve parachute). We only launch when everything is right – the weather, the gear and your gut feeling.
Paragleiten.faqClothingQ: What should I wear for flying?
Paragleiten.faqClothingA: Sturdy, ankle-high shoes (hiking boots ideal), long trousers and a windproof jacket. At launch altitude (approx. 2,000 m) it can be chilly even in midsummer. Sunglasses and gloves recommended. We provide the helmet.
Paragleiten.faqMediaQ: Are there photos and videos of the flight?
Paragleiten.faqMediaA: Yes! Your pilot films the entire flight in HD and takes aerial photos. In the Classic+Media (€ 170), Premium (€ 190) and XXL package (€ 250+) the media package is already included. You get everything on an SD card right after landing.
Paragleiten.eeatP1: We’re not an anonymous booking platform – we’re real tandem pilots from East Tyrol. Every flight is personally conducted by one of our experienced, ÖAeC-certified pilots. Our weather-check process starts the evening before: we analyse wind, thermals and cloud cover and inform you between 6 and 7 pm whether your slot is confirmed.
Paragleiten.eeatP2: Over 250 reviews with a 5.0 out of 5 rating on Google and TripAdvisor confirm: you’re in good hands with us. And if the weather doesn’t cooperate – no problem. Free rescheduling, any time.
Paragleiten.crosslinkUrlaubP: A tandem flight as the highlight of your East Tyrol holiday – tips for families, couples & solo travellers.
Paragleiten.crosslinkAnreiseP: Travel times from all valleys, parking & meeting point – stress-free to your flight.
Paragleiten.ctaTitle: Ready for your flight above East Tyrol?
Paragleiten.ctaP1: Whether Zettersfeld, Hochstein or Thurntaler – we’ll find the right launch site for your experience.
Paragleiten.ctaWhatsapp: Or contact us directly via WhatsApp
